subject: Add multi-user support.
commitMessage:
Add multi-user support.

Bug-Tizen:PTREL-238

Change-Id: I4508e8132cb865be2f5e189f0374ef2b56309b8b
Signed-off-by: rajendra <vadthe.naik@samsung.com>

comments.message:
Patch Set 1:

I agree with Jean-Benoit: please, use TZ_XXX_YYY macros/variables when possible because, even if the paths don't change in the file tizen-plaform.conf, they may change in the future.

Patch Set 2: Code-Review-1

The fix in the spec file is not correct as /opt/usr/... is a user-specific directory. 

So the call to chgrp ... must be removed from spec file.

From what I see in the source code, the CMakeLists.txt file contains:

SET(DATADIR "/opt/${PREFIX}/data")

and later, DATADIR is defined for compilation. Bui I don't see where it's used in the code: 

"grep -sr DATADIR apps/core/preloaded/mobileprint" gives nothing, except CMakelists.txt.

So if DATADIR is unused, you can probably clean up CMakeLists.txt, and remove the "chgrp ... " in spec file
